text: Good pizza! The slices are very big. You can get a drink, two slices and fries for 7,50$! The fries are super crunchy.
Good pizza and I thought they didn't take Visa, but apparently they do now.

The 3 topping med (9$ ish w/ tax) and 3 topping large (11$ ish w/ tax) mon to weds special is worth it! pretty cheap and decent pizza, nothing mind blowing, but it get's the job done and the price is right! :)
